name: Shoot
description:
You throw your orb at a target within short range. Roll Dexterity vs Defense. On a hit, the orb deals 1d4+BODY base damage, plus an additional 1d4 for each charge it contains. The charges are expended, and the orb magically returns to you, propelled by its own magic force.

On a miss, it deals no damage, retains and charges it contains, and falls to the ground in a space adjacent to the target (GM's choice). You must either move to retrieve it or use a half action to recall the orb to magically to you.

improvements.name: Bank Shot
improvements.description: You may bounce your orb off a surface or object as part of its trajectory. The total distance covered must still be within range.

improvements.name: From Downtown
improvements.description: You may choose to roll ill-favored to aim at a target up to double your range. If you do so and deal damage to a target beyond your usual range, the damage is tripled.

improvements.name: Traveling
improvements.description: When you hit a target, instead of expending charges to deal damage, you may expend all charges to teleport to the orb's location.
